LanguageData.ARA_DummyAmmo.label: Ammo
LanguageData.ARA_DummyAmmo.description: Ammunition used by the Arachnae swarm.
LanguageData.ARA_Filth_SpentAcid.label: Arachnae Spent Acid
LanguageData.ARA_Turret_Beespikeshooter.label: Beespike Shooter
LanguageData.ARA_Turret_Beespikeshooter.description: A small turret that fires venomous barbs.
LanguageData.ARA_Gun_Beespikeshooter.label: Beespike Shooter
LanguageData.ARA_Gun_Beespikeshooter.description: An organ that fires small venomous barbs.
LanguageData.Arachnae_AcidlingTrap.label: Arachnae Explosive Cocoon
LanguageData.Arachnae_AcidlingTrap.description: A dormant cocoon containing a dormant Arachnae bug. The bug inside wakes up if something gets too close.
LanguageData.ARA_AutoSniperCannon.label: Bloodrock Gigabite Cannon Organism
LanguageData.ARA_AutoSniperCannon.description: One of the Arachnae swarm's hive defense organisms. It is composed of a non-autonomous, highly specialized cluster of organs that rapidly fires volleys of spines to severely wound large enemies or incoming crowds. As a defense organism, it can automatically generate resupply ammunition by consuming nutrition.
LanguageData.Gun_ARA_AutoSniperCannonTurret.label: Bloodrock Gigabite Cannon
LanguageData.ARA_Acidling_AutoMortar.label: Explosive Species Launcher Nest Organism
LanguageData.ARA_Acidling_AutoMortar.description: One of the Arachnae swarm's hive defense organisms. It is composed of a non-autonomous, highly specialized cluster of organs that launches multiple Arachnae Explosive Species auxiliary bugs at incoming enemies. The auxiliary bugs automatically seek their targets and perform suicide attacks. As a defense organism, it can automatically generate resupply ammunition by consuming nutrition.
LanguageData.ARA_Acidling_Artillery_AutoMortar.label: Explosive Species Launcher Nest
LanguageData.ArachnaeBase_Race_Acidling_Proj.label: Arachnae Explosive Species
LanguageData.CatastropheMissileSilo.label: Disaster Acid Cannon Organism
LanguageData.CatastropheMissileSilo.description: One of the ultimate bio-weapons evolved by the Arachnae swarm. It is composed of a non-autonomous, highly specialized cluster of organs, and the fearsome Acid Cannon launches Disaster Acid Missiles. As a complex defense system, it can fire at local targets or perform precision strikes against distant threats, and can automatically generate resupply ammunition by consuming nutrition.
LanguageData.CatastropheMissile_Weapon.label: Disaster Acid Cannon
LanguageData.CatastropheMissile_Weapon.description: The main body of the Disaster Acid Cannon Organism, responsible for launching and guiding the semi-autonomous Disaster Acid Missiles.
LanguageData.ARA_CatastropheMissile_Shell.label: Disaster Acid Missile
LanguageData.ARA_CatastropheMissile_Shell.description: A Disaster Acid Missile used by the Arachnae swarm, which can only be fired by the Disaster Acid Cannon Organism.
LanguageData.Projectile_CatastropheMissile.label: Disaster Acid Missile
LanguageData.Projectile_CatastropheMissile_Fake.label: Disaster Acid Missile
